item.title: Katie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Bea says that the art of reading is slowly dying, that it's an intimate ritual, that a book is a mirror that offers us only what we already carry inside us, that when we read, we do it with all our heart and mind, and great readers are becoming more scarce by the day." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Katie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Katie add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "The phoenix must burn to emerge." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Katie add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "You've got to let go of who you were, to become who you will be." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Katie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Some like to believe it's the book that chooses the person." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Katie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "The only way you can truly get to know an author is through the trail of ink he leaves behind him. The person you think you see is only an empty character: truth is always hidden in fiction." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón
